Sentencas: The investigation dealt with the effect of Fe and Au wt.% concentrations on the enhanced performance and stability of Ni/GDC under rSOC operation.
Titulo: Enhancement of the intrinsic Ni/GDC activity under rSOC operation by means of Fe-Au doping: An electro-kinetic study

Sentencas: Moreover, it focused on the comparison of the intrinsic electro-kinetics between the best performing Fe-Au-modified cell and Ni/GDC under SOE operation.
Titulo: Enhancement of the intrinsic Ni/GDC activity under rSOC operation by means of Fe-Au doping: An electro-kinetic study

Sentencas: The rSOC performance and stability of all cells was examined in the temperature range of 900-800 degrees C.
Titulo: Enhancement of the intrinsic Ni/GDC activity under rSOC operation by means of Fe-Au doping: An electro-kinetic study

Sentencas: The electro-kinetic measurements took place at 900 degrees C by varying the pH2O. All Fe-Au-Ni/GDC electrodes exhibited enhanced activity, compared to the SoA Ni/GDC, with variations in their stability after three rSOC cycles.
Titulo: Enhancement of the intrinsic Ni/GDC activity under rSOC operation by means of Fe-Au doping: An electro-kinetic study

Sentencas: Specifically, the fuel electrode with the lowest wt.% concentration in Fe and Au (0.5Fe-1Au-Ni/GDC) exhibited the highest activity and stability under rSOC operation.
Titulo: Enhancement of the intrinsic Ni/GDC activity under rSOC operation by means of Fe-Au doping: An electro-kinetic study

Sentencas: By increasing the wt.% loadings to 2 wt% Fe and 3 wt% Au, there was rapid degradation of the initially high performance, mainly due to increase of the ohmic resistance.
Titulo: Enhancement of the intrinsic Ni/GDC activity under rSOC operation by means of Fe-Au doping: An electro-kinetic study

Sentencas: SEM analysis showed higher macro-porosity on the reduced state of the modified electrodes, which in the case of the best performing 0.5Fe-1Au-Ni/GDC was the least affected after rSOC operation.
Titulo: Enhancement of the intrinsic Ni/GDC activity under rSOC operation by means of Fe-Au doping: An electro-kinetic study

Sentencas: Interestingly, the SOE performance of the examined Fe-Au-modified electrodes was not similarly inhibited by the decrease of temperature, compared to Ni/GDC.
Titulo: Enhancement of the intrinsic Ni/GDC activity under rSOC operation by means of Fe-Au doping: An electro-kinetic study

Sentencas: This was further clarified through electro-kinetic measurements, aiming to verify the effect from the Fe-Au doping on the intrinsic electrochemical activity of Ni/GDC for the H2O electrolysis reaction.
Titulo: Enhancement of the intrinsic Ni/GDC activity under rSOC operation by means of Fe-Au doping: An electro-kinetic study

Sentencas: Comparison between the SoA and the best performing 0.5Fe-1Au-Ni/GDC showed an enhancing effect on the intrinsic electro-kinetics of the modified electrode.
Titulo: Enhancement of the intrinsic Ni/GDC activity under rSOC operation by means of Fe-Au doping: An electro-kinetic study

Sentencas: Specifically, the dependence of the polarization resistance on the pH2O was found to be strongly positive, resulting in a higher apparent reaction order, compared to Ni/GDC.
Titulo: Enhancement of the intrinsic Ni/GDC activity under rSOC operation by means of Fe-Au doping: An electro-kinetic study
